title: Geometric Diamond Mangalsutra Pendant Set in Rose Gold - A Modern Take on Tradition
materials: 18K Rose Gold Chain and Pendant setting
Black Beads. Hyderabadi Polish for a lustrous finish.
features: A contemporary geometric hexagon pendant design featuring a central cluster of shimmering round brilliant cut diamonds. Accented with traditional black beads woven into the rose gold chain. The pendant showcases a modern aesthetic, perfectly balancing traditional and contemporary elements. The setting maximizes light reflection for enhanced brilliance.
occasions: or as a modern interpretation of traditional wedding jewelry. Suitable for both casual and formal occasions.
description: A unique blend of tradition and modernity, crafted with high-quality materials and meticulous attention to detail. This Mangalsutra is a symbol of everlasting love with a contemporary twist. Comfortable for everyday wear, yet elegant enough for special events. Makes a meaningful and stylish gift.
